column1: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
column3: Jon Q Spellbad, 2 stars: Not as good as Harry Potter - Never read the book, seen the movie or listened to the audio book but I can tell you right now - its not as good as harry potter;  Bob B A Bobson, 4 stars: Fantastic Book - Loved listening to this book before bed.

column1: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
column3: JK Rowling, 5 stars: Best audio book EVER! - Best audio book I ever listened to. Stephen Fry does an excellent job reading the superb prose written by a genius author.
